Class AdminCreateUsersCenterPanel

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.gui.AdminCreateUsersCenterPanel
public class AdminCreateUsersCenterPanel extends Object
Represents the center panel UI for the admin dashboard section where new users (Faculty and Students) can be created.

This class provides a static method to create the panel, which includes clickable panes for Faculty and Student user creation. Upon clicking, the appropriate registration panel is displayed.

  • Method Details

    • createPanel

      public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane createPanel(int adminId)
      Provides the center panel UI for the "Create Users" section in the admin dashboard.

      This panel includes clickable areas for creating Faculty and Student user accounts, displaying respective registration forms upon selection.

      Parameters:
      adminId - The ID of the admin user (currently unused in this method).
      Returns:
      A Pane containing the UI components for user creation.

    • createUserPane

      private static javafx.scene.layout.Pane createUserPane(String imagePath, String labelText, double layoutX, double layoutY)
      Creates a user selection pane with an image and label, styled with hover effects.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - the resource path to the user image to display
      labelText - the text label for the user type (e.g., "Faculty" or "Student")
      layoutX - the X-coordinate for the pane's layout position
      layoutY - the Y-coordinate for the pane's layout position
      Returns:
      a styled Pane representing a user type selection with hover effects
